forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: More clouds than sun. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 67F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with some clearing expected late. Low around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 19C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will give way to low clouds and fog after midnight. Low 12C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 55F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 68F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. Low 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High near 65F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 52F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 69F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 12C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low near 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 68F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Fog early, then cloudy after midnight. Low 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 19C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
